channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Some state lawmakers see new opportunities to pass vaccine exemptions
item.description: Vaccination bills are popping up in more than 15 states as lawmakers aim to potentially resurrect or create new religious exemptions from immunization mandates, establish state-level vaccine injury databases or dictate what providers must tell patients about the shots.

item.title: Top Trump administration officials in Chicago for start of immigration enforcement crackdown
Haitian migrants in Springfield, Ohio, turn to faith amid deportation fears
